Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.metaclass

[Groovy] Class ControllerDynamicMethods

    • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.metaclass.ControllerDynamicMethods

    • Holds constants that refer to the names of dynamic methods and properties within controllers

      Authors:
      Graeme Rocher
      Since:
      Oct 24, 2005

      • Method Detail

        • static void registerCommonWebProperties(groovy.lang.MetaClass mc, GrailsApplication application)

          This creates the difference dynamic methods and properties on the controllers. Most methods are implemented by looking up the current request from the RequestContextHolder (RCH)
